short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure one (1) Aerial Lift Van.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure \\\u201cQuantity\\\u201d one (1) Aerial Lift Van for delivery to Edmonton Alberta.\ The requested delivery date is 300 days after contract award.\ Delivery locations, quantities required, mandatory requirements and deliverables information are detailed under Annex A, entitled Requirement, and Annex B, entitled Basis of Payment, of this solicitation package.\ There is no security requirement associated with this requirement.\ The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.\ Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
**Aerial Lift Van Tender Announcement**

* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01024898
* **Solicitation Number**: W8476-236694/A
* **Publication Date**: March 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 18, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST)

The Department of National Defence (DND) issued a tender invitation for the procurement of "One (1) Aerial Lift Van" to be delivered to Edmonton, Alberta. The delivery date is expected to be 300 days after contract award. detailed information on delivery locations, quantities required, mandatory requirements, and deliverables can be found in Annex A (Requirements) and Annex B (Basis of Payment) of the solicitation package.

**Pre-Qualification Requirements**

* Aerial Lift Van must be designed for both aerial and truck applications.

**Tender Packages**

A total of five tender packages are available for download from the Canada Buys website:

1. Original RFP Document (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/01/c4c29d896308978bd920640e7fab690f](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/01/c4c29d896308978bd920640e7fab690f)
2. Original RFP Document (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/01/ca2b9f3fe2b9f764336d31a8f805c0d8](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/01/ca2b9f3fe2b9f764336d31a8f805c0d8)
3. Amendment Package 1 (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/17/9a874810586a85d124686c53c9cfdb93](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/17/9a874810586a85d124686c53c9cfdb93)
4. Amendment Package 2 (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/05/09/
